title: Okta Verify (com.okta.mobile)
description: Use this section to define settings for Okta Verify

OktaVerify.DeviceHealthOptions.title: Device Health Options
OktaVerify.DeviceHealthOptions.description: Hide the Device Health page, or hide specific health checks in Okta Verify on user devices

OktaVerify.EnrollmentOptions.title: Enrollment Options
OktaVerify.EnrollmentOptions.description: Configure whether users are prompted to enroll in Okta Verify

OktaVerify.OrgUrl.title: Okta Org Url
OktaVerify.OrgUrl.description: Pre-populate the org URL so that users don't have to enter this value on the first enter your sign-in URL page

OktaVerify.ReportDiagnostics.title: Report Diagnostics
OktaVerify.ReportDiagnostics.description: Configure whether Okta Verify diagnostic and crash information is shared with Okta

OktaVerify.LaunchOptions.title: Set Launch Options
OktaVerify.LaunchOptions.description: Configure whether Okta Verify shows the accounts list upon launch

OktaVerify.UserPrincipalName.title: Okta User Principle Name
OktaVerify.UserPrincipalName.description: Automatically populates the username in the Sign-In Widget

OktaVerify.OSQueryCustomChecksTimeout.title: OS Query Custom Checks Timeouts
OktaVerify.OSQueryCustomChecksTimeout.description: Admins can use this value to customize the osquery timeout value and fine-tune device posture checks

OktaVerify.EnableOSQueryCustomChecks.title: Enable OS Query Custom Checks
OktaVerify.EnableOSQueryCustomChecks.description: Specifies whether custom OSQuery checks can be run on this device.

OktaVerify.OSQueryAllowedDomains.title: OS Query Allowed Domains
OktaVerify.OSQueryAllowedDomains.description: Defines the organizations that can run custom OSQuery checks on this device.
